title: Email, sending failure.
content: My email C/o THUNDERBIRD, has just started to stop, sending , my emails. When I try to send, it comes up with a message box that says that I need Authorization to use email server ! never had this happen before and I don't know how to overcome it and get my EMAILS SENT. CAN YOU PLEASE HELP.
creator: johnnyripper3

title: My thunderbird account will not open on my mac
content: You can give me some help in finding out why my Thunderbird account will not launch. It is VERY inconvenient to not have access to email. Thunderbird works on my macbook, and ipad but not my imac. WHY ????

title: Keyboard Delete button
content: Suddenly, my keyboard DELETE button will not delete Thunderbird emails. I have to right click and click on rubbish bin to delete. Very tiresome. My delete button works fine on every other programme.
creator: Teacup2
